content: have you ever tried corner-to-corner or filet crochet working in the round learn how with my c2c-filet hybrid technique while making this quick coaster download this free pattern and follow along on my youtube channel 1 to get started on this fun coaster you will learn how to work both the blocks and open spaces while working in the round this pattern includes both row-by-row written instructions and a design chart for reference **gauge ** gauge is not critical for this project **finished size ** 5 square **skill level ** easy this pattern is written in standard u s terms 1 https //youtu be/cvzpojndvuc
